column4: I have problems with a crashing server and I have very little idea of what is causing it and where to look. What should I check more than syslog?
mebbe try typing "top" in terminal and see whats eating all the CPU and memory
yeah I've done that. but can't really find anything special. it says almost all ram is used but I can't find processes that use those ram. :/
the processes at the top of the list are the ones using the most memory...
